name: MAXIM GREY
motto: If a man asks for a fight, who is to blame if he is himself destroyed?
story: Maxim Grey wished for the quiet life of a clockmaker and tinkerer. Puttering about his shop gave him no end of peace until that fateful day when he intervened in a stress fight outside his establishment. Most investigator operate in the shadows, but all too often violence spills int√© the public eye, and on this occasion, a gateway was involved. Maxim Grey was one of the few left standing when the red haze lifted from his eyes. He has slept poorly ever since.
